MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH2 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Coniston Road and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.30PM so they can remove a generator and put customers back on main supply. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.30PM on 4th March 2021.
